snippet.title: The Golem - Trailer
snippet.description:
"The Golem" is a hard puzzle game by Dom Camus, featuring music by Olli Oja. Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1270390/ Favourite or add to collections on itch.io: https://bateleur.itch.io/the-golem

* No timer.
* No exploration.
* No secrets.
* 50 varied levels of increasing difficulty.
